00021 /***************************************************************************
00022  *                              DATA OPTIONS                               *
00023  ***************************************************************************/
00024 // CFG_DAT_DIR_COMMAND -- Directory for commands to be loaded from; should contain subdirs a-z.
00025 //  Default: "command"
00026 #define CFG_DAT_DIR_COMMAND     "command"
00027 
00028 // CFG_DAT_DIR_LOG -- Directory for logfiles to be written to.
00029 //  Default: "log"
00030 #define CFG_DAT_DIR_LOG         "log"
00031 
00032 /***************************************************************************
00033  *                              GAME OPTIONS                               *
00034  ***************************************************************************/
00035 // CFG_GAM_PULSE_RATE -- How many cycles per second should be processed.
00036 //  Default: 100
00037 #define CFG_GAM_PULSE_RATE      100
00038 
00039 /***************************************************************************
00040  *                              LOG OPTIONS                                *
00041  ***************************************************************************/
00042 // CFG_LOG_SERVER -- Default log for boot / shutdown and general information.
00043 //  Default: "server.log"
00044 #define CFG_LOG_SERVER          "server.log"
00045 
00046 /***************************************************************************
00047  *                              MEMORY OPTIONS                             *
00048  ***************************************************************************/
00049 // CFG_MEM_MAX_BITSET -- Maximum size of all bitset elements within the server.
00050 //  Default: 128
00051 #define CFG_MEM_MAX_BITSET      128
00052 
00053 /***************************************************************************
00054  *                              SOCKET OPTIONS                             *
00055  ***************************************************************************/
00056 // CFG_SOC_BIND_ADDR -- IP address to bind the listening server socket to.
00057 //  Default: "::"
00058 #define CFG_SOC_BIND_ADDR       "::"
00059 
00060 // CFG_SOC_MIN_PORTNUM -- The listening server socket must be above this port.
00061 //  Default: 1024
00062 #define CFG_SOC_MIN_PORTNUM     1024
00063 
00064 // CFG_SOC_MAX_IDLE -- (Minutes / tick rate) before disconneting an idle socket. Approx 30 minutes.
00065 //  Default: ( ( 30 * 60 * USLEEP_MAX ) / ( USLEEP_MAX / CFG_GAM_PULSE_RATE ) )
00066 #define CFG_SOC_MAX_IDLE        ( ( 30 * 60 * USLEEP_MAX ) / ( USLEEP_MAX / CFG_GAM_PULSE_RATE ) )
00067 
00068 // CFG_SOC_MAX_PENDING -- The maximum number of pending connections to allow in the listen backlog.
00069 //  Default: 5
00070 #define CFG_SOC_MAX_PENDING     5
00071 
00072 // CFG_SOC_MAX_PORTNUM -- The listening server socket must be below this port.
00073 //  Default: 65536
00074 #define CFG_SOC_MAX_PORTNUM     65536
00075 
00076 // CFG_SOC_PORTNUM -- Port number to listen on if not specified on the command line.
00077 //  Default: 4321
00078 #define CFG_SOC_PORTNUM         4321
00079 
00080 /***************************************************************************
00081  *                              STRING OPTIONS                             *
00082  ***************************************************************************/
00083 // CFG_STR_IDLE -- String sent on disconnecting an idle socket.
00084 //  Default: CRLF "Idle limit reached. Goodbye."
00085 #define CFG_STR_IDLE            CRLF "Idle limit reached. Goodbye." CRLF
00086 // CFG_STR_LOGIN -- String sent on initial socket connection.
00087 //  Default: "For a list of commands type 'help'." CRLF "Please enter your name: "
00088 #define CFG_STR_LOGIN           "For a list of commands type 'help'." CRLF "Please enter your name: "
00089 
00090 // CFG_STR_MAX_BUFLEN -- Maximum length of all char type buffers.
00091 //  Default: 16384
00092 #define CFG_STR_MAX_BUFLEN      16384
00093 
00094 // CFG_STR_EXIT_FAILURE -- String to write to log on EXIT_FAILURE.
00095 //  Default: "Server terminated."
00096 #define CFG_STR_EXIT_FAILURE    "Server terminated."
00097 
00098 // CFG_STR_EXIT_SUCCESS -- String to write to log on EXIT_SUCCESS.
00099 //  Default: "Normal termination of server."
00100 #define CFG_STR_EXIT_SUCCESS    "Normal termination of server."
00101 
00102 // CFG_STR_UTILS_ERROR -- String to prepend to logs flagged UTILS_TYPE_ERROR.
00103 //  Default: "[ERROR ] "
00104 #define CFG_STR_UTILS_ERROR     "[ERROR] "
00105 
00106 // CFG_STR_UTILS_INFO -- String to prepend to logs flagged UTILS_TYPE_INFO.
00107 //  Default: "[INFO  ] "
00108 #define CFG_STR_UTILS_INFO      "[INFO  ] "
00109 
00110 // CFG_STR_UTILS_SOCKET -- String to prepend to logs flagged UTILS_TYPE_SOCKET.

00112 #define CFG_STR_UTILS_SOCKET    "[SOCKET] "
00113 
00114 // CFG_STR_VERSION -- The current server version.
